data.title: ONE Championship ‘my dream’ says Morocco’s Abdelali Zahidi after stunning debut head kick KO
data.description: Morocco’s new Muay Thai sensation Abdelali Zahidi is determined to leave his mark in ONE Championship after a stunning debut knockout last weekend in Bangkok.

data.title: ONE Championship rankings snub irks Younes Rabah – ‘I deserve it’
data.description: Younes Rabah has hit out at his exclusion from the ONE Championship featherweight Muay Thai rankings after recently making a winning debut in the division.

data.title: Buriram clash with Kawasaki Frontale in ACL Elite
data.description: Thai champions Buriram United will be eager to make amends for the heavy AFC Champions League Elite defeat they suffered a few weeks ago when they take on Kawasaki Frontale on Tuesday.

data.title: Leicester City sack manager Cooper after winless run
data.description: Leicester City have sacked manager Steve Cooper following a poor run of form, the Premier League club announced on Sunday after a winless run left them hovering two points above the relegation zone.

data.title: Leicester woes continue with loss to Chelsea
data.description: LEICESTER, England - Goals from Nicolas Jackson and Enzo Fernandez helped Chelsea to a 2-1 Premier League win at Leicester City on Saturday that would have been more comfortable if Blues winger Noni Madueke had not blocked teammate Cole Palmer’s goalbound shot.

data.title: ONE Friday Fights 88: Zahidi’s head-kick KO highlights early slew of finishes and bonuses
data.description: Abdelali Zahidi’s stunning head-kick KO was the highlight of an action-packed international portion of last night’s ONE Friday Fights 88 card in Bangkok, amid a slew of early finishes and bonuses.

data.title: Conor McGregor, UFC fighter, is held liable for sexual assault in Ireland
data.description: DUBLIN — A woman who had accused mixed martial arts (MMA) fighter Conor McGregor of raping her in a hotel penthouse in 2018 was awarded nearly 250,000 euros (about US$260,000) in damages Friday after a jury found him liable for sexual assault in a civil trial in Dublin.

data.title: Stephen Irvine believes KO ‘failure’ cost him ONE Championship contract, vows to return

data.title: Tears flow as fans salute retiring Nadal after Davis Cup defeat
data.description: MALAGA, Spain: Rafael Nadal said farewell to tennis and his fans saluted their retiring hero in a bittersweet and emotional ceremony at a sold-out Malaga arena following his last professional match in Spain’s 2-1 Davis Cup defeat to the Netherlands on Tuesday.
